doc.title: Captain Valedor versus the Spider Queen

credit.role: Kerr, Mysterious Being from Another World

doc.plot: Captain Valedor fights his most death-defying adventure to date, in this, the fourteenth chapter of an otherwise non-existent serial. As the leader of the Intergalactic Safety League, a fighting force dedicated to protecting all that is good and properous in the galaxy of the future, Valedor, weapons expert Dr. Photon, and Kerr, mysterious being from another world, are dispatched to protect Tranquilia, a planet that has come under siege by the dark armies of the evil Spider Queen. In this chapter, the three heroes enter into her fortress. There, Valedor will have his final, exciting battle with the Spider Queen herself, while Photon and Kerr will encounter one of the horrors she intends to let loose on the unsuspecting populous! Low-rent adventures ensue.
